name: Mushroom Mutter Masala
description: Mushroom Mutter Masala is an easy and tasty main meal
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon each cardamom powder (cinnamon powder/stick( or 1/2 inch))
1/2 cup total almonds and cashews soaked for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Puree the tomatoes with ginger, garlic, almonds, cashews, pepper and 1/2 of the chopped onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree the tomatoes with ginger, garlic, almonds, cashews, pepper and 1/2 of the chopped onion.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat oil and add all the spices( hing, coriander powder, cumin powder, bay leaf, turmeric, cardamom and cinnamon)
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat oil and add all the spices( hing, coriander powder, cumin powder, bay leaf, turmeric, cardamom and cinnamon)

recipeInstructions.text: Let the spices simmer for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the spices simmer for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add left over chopped onions and stir on medium heat till golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Add left over chopped onions and stir on medium heat till golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the puree and let it simmer on low-medium for 10-15 minutes till most water evaporates and the resulting thick curry leaves some oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the puree and let it simmer on low-medium for 10-15 minutes till most water evaporates and the resulting thick curry leaves some oil.

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate pan, saute the mushrooms in butter over medium heat for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a separate pan, saute the mushrooms in butter over medium heat for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mushrooms and peas to the simmering curry. Add salt and some water( half a cup) so that the curry can cover all the mushrooms and peas.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the mushrooms and peas to the simmering curry. Add salt and some water( half a cup) so that the curry can cover all the mushrooms and peas.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with cilantro leaves when done.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with cilantro leaves when done.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with Naan, Roti or Rice!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with Naan, Roti or Rice!

keywords: mushroom curry, pea curry, vegan curry
